mdRecord.dcterms:title: Missouri State Capitol, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tracy and Swartwout (American architectural firm, 1913-1922) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Missouri State Capitol is located in the U.S. state of Missouri. Housing the Missouri General Assembly, it is located in the state capital of Jefferson City at 201 West Capitol Avenue. The domed building was designed by the New York architectural firm of Tracy and Swartwout and completed in 1917. It is the third capitol building in Jefferson City -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Missouri_State_Capitol. [work]
